revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMCD3GN |revision=V (Comcast) |asin= |fcc_date=05/07/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Hitron |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router, cable modem, analog phone gateway |fcc_id=RRK-WMPN13A1 |ic_id= |pcb_id=8WMPN13.2A1G |pwr_v=100-120 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=C7P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETC4800 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Alpha Networks WMP-N13 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3662 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=HOME-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^HOME-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=10.0.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:26:F3, 78:CD:8E |oui_eth=00:26:F3, 78:CD:8E }} :• [http://media2.comcast.net/anon.comcastonline2/support/userguides/Wireless_Gateway_User_Guide_030811.pdf User manual for Comcast] :• [http://web.archive.org/web/20101207035322/http://www.smc.com/files/AX/SMCD3GNVFeatureSheet.pdf Feature sheet for the device (via archive.org)]
"8WMPN13..2A1G" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos.
"P/N: 3833080408N0 REV 12.1" appears to be silkscreened on the board. <!-- per C. Dodgeson --> :''[[Hitron]]'' (''Hitron Technologies'') is the presumed manufacturer.
This device is using TNETC4800 (TNETC4800ZDWGU) - a ''[[Intel Puma]] 5'' SoC.
The default SSID is '''HOME-XXXX''' where '''XXXX''' is the last two octets :of the wireless interface MAC address.
[http://certifications.wi-fi.org/pdf_certificate.php?cid=WFA8898 WiFi Certified]
*[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/smc-smcd3gnv-docsis30-multimedia-voice-gateway-933 On '''SpeedGuide.net'''] :This is a 4x4 cable modem.<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=4 |up_c=4 }}
===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.g.comcast.net/device.php?devid=332 '''Comcast''' device database entry])
